Package application

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    Corgi
    Represents a Corgi, which is a type of Pet.
    GameLoop
    Acts as the primary loop for the animations and general updates for the BuffBud application.
    GameWindow
    Acts as the primary window for the BuffBud game.
    IntroWindow
    Creates the introduction window when creating a new pet for the BuffBud application.
    Launcher
    Launches the main class, but does not extend Application.
    Main
    Ties together the BuffBud application by instantiating windows and loops and deciding whether to continue with a pre-existing pet or create a new one.
    NotificationApp
    Creates an notification window when the user needs to be alerted that their pet requires attention.
    Pet
    Class to represent a pet.
    Utility
    Contains useful saving and loading mechanisms.
